Initialize Flask application\\n app = Flask(__name__)\\n+# Configure CORS with specific allowed origins\\n+allowed_origins = [\\\"http://localhost:8080\\\", \\\"http://127.0.0.1:8080\\\"]\\n+CORS(app, origins=allowed_origins, resources={r\\\"/api/*\\\": {}})\",\"path\":\"backend/app.py\",\"commit_id\":\"cf9305e448995c38d884221ecf36f73f67b8288d\",\"original_commit_id\":\"cf9305e448995c38d884221ecf36f73f67b8288d\",\"user\":{\"login\":\"gemini-code-assist[bot]\",\"id\":176961590,\"node_id\":\"BOT_kgDOCow4Ng\",\"avatar_url\":\"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/in/956858?v=4\",\"gravatar_id\":\"\",\"url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D\",\"html_url\":\"https://github.com/apps/gemini-code-assist\",\"followers_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/followers\",\"following_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/following{/other_user}\",\"gists_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/gists{/gist_id}\",\"starred_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/starred{/owner}{/repo}\",\"subscriptions_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/subscriptions\",\"organizations_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/orgs\",\"repos_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/repos\",\"events_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/events{/privacy}\",\"received_events_url\":\"https://api.github.com/users/gemini-code-assist%5Bbot%5D/received_events\",\"type\":\"Bot\",\"user_view_type\":\"public\",\"site_admin\":false},\"body\":\"![medium](https://www.gstatic.com/codereviewagent/medium-priority.svg)\\n\\nThe CORS allowed origins are hardcoded. While this is acceptable for a local development setup, it is not flexible for different environments (e.g., staging, production) where the frontend might be served from a different origin. It's a best practice to make this configurable via environment variables.\\n\\n```suggestion\\nallowed_origins_str = os.environ.get(\\\"CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS\\\", \\\"http://localhost:8080,http://127.0.0.1:8080\\\")\\nallowed_origins = [origin.strip() for origin in allowed_origins_str.split(',')]\\nCORS(app, origins=allowed_origins, resources={r\\\"/api/*\\\": {}})\\n```\",\"created_at\":\"2025-10-06T22:51:13Z\",\"updated_at\":\"2025-10-06T22:51:13Z\",\"html_url\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/95#discussion_r2408913958\",\"pull_request_url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/95\",\"author_association\":\"CONTRIBUTOR\",\"_links\":{\"self\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408913958\"},\"html\":{\"href\":\"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/95#discussion_r2408913958\"},\"pull_request\":{\"href\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/95\"}},\"reactions\":{\"url\":\"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments/2408913958/reactions\",\"total_count\":0,\"+1\":0,\"-1\":0,\"laugh\":0,\"hooray\":0,\"confused\":0,\"heart\":0,\"rocket\":0,\"eyes\":0},\"start_line\":79,\"original_start_line\":79,\"start_side\":\"RIGHT\",\"line\":80,\"original_line\":80,\"side\":\"RIGHT\",\"original_position\":14,\"position\":14,\"subject_type\":\"line\"}]", "annotations": null}], "isError": false}
